languages.text:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

languages.text:
装备者使用单体攻击成功击中目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
当装备者攻击眩晕的敌人时，离目标最近的敌人也会陷入眩晕状态。
languages.original_text:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

traits.locale_text:
装备者使用单体攻击成功击中目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
当装备者攻击眩晕的敌人时，离目标最近的敌人也会陷入眩晕状态。

languages.text:
-5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}でターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、使用者の単発攻撃が成功すると、ターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}にさせる。
使用者が気絶状態の敵を攻撃した場合、最も近くにいる敵も気絶させる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に失格し、5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた場合、着用者の成功した単攻撃はターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}させる。
着用者が気絶した敵を攻撃した場合、最も近くにいる敵も気絶する。

languages.text:
Si el portador impacta con un ataque individual, deja {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} si falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5.
Si el portador ataca a un enemigo aturdido, el enemigo más cercano también queda aturdido.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador impacta con un ataque individual, deja {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} si falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -5.
Si el portador ataca a un enemigo aturdido, el enemigo más cercano también queda aturdido.

languages.text:
Erfolgreiche Einzelangriffe des Trägers fügen dem Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} zu, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 misslingt.
Greift der Träger einen betäubten Feind an, wird der nächste Feind ebenfalls betäubt.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

traits.locale_text:
Erfolgreiche Einzelangriffe des Trägers fügen dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zu, falls es bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 scheitert.
Wenn der Träger einen betäubten Feind angreift, wird der nächste Feind ebenfalls betäubt.

languages.text:
Цель успешной одиночной атаки персонажа выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −5 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если персонаж атакует оглушенного противника, ближайший противник также получает оглушение.

If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

traits.locale_text:
Цель успешной одиночной атаки персонажа выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −5 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Цель успешной одиночной атаки персонажа выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −5 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если персонаж атакует оглушенного противника, ближайший противник также получает оглушение.

languages.text:
Les attaques ponctuelles réussies de l'utilisateur infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} à la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} si celle-ci échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5.
Si l'utilisateur attaque un ennemi frappé par l'effet Étourdissement, l'ennemi le plus proche subit également cet effet.

If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

languages.text:
Takan kişinin başarılı tek saldırıları, −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemeyen hedefi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemletir{/g}.
Takan kişi, sersemlemiş bir düşmana saldırırsa en yakındaki düşman da sersemler.
